## Origin and destination

Description
Converts long country names in any language to one of many different country code schemes or
country names. ‘countryname‘ does 2 passes on the data. First, it tries to detect variations of
country names in many languages extracted from the Unicode Common Locale Data Repository.
Second, it applies ‘countrycode‘’s English regexes to try to match the remaining cases.





```{r}
data <- read.csv("gdp.csv")
print(data)
data <-
data %>% 
  rename(Dollars = X.millions.of.international.dollars.)
```
